metadataAttributes.Title: How to Become a Blockchain Developer
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Demand for blockchain developers is skyrocketing. In this program, you'll work with the Bitcoin and Ethereum protocols, build projects for real-world application, and gain the essential skills for a career in this dynamic space.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Smart Contracts, Blockchain, Private Blockchain, Cryptocurrency Tokens, Privacy and Security, Bitcoin Core, Bitcoin, ZoKrates, ZK-SNARKs, Solidity, Ethereum, Decentralized Storage Protocol, Dapps, Blockchain Transactions, Blockchain Oracles, UML
